about_the_game:
Finally, the time has come - the opportunity to immerse yourself in huge space battles with hundreds of allies and enemies all fighting at once! In Starfighter Aces, you take the role of a new pilot in the Allied Starfighter Corps.

As a fresh officer, you'll fly increasingly difficult missions with your squadron. Each victory will bring you closer to promotion - and more importantly - a complete tour of duty. After 20 missions, combat pilots may retire from the service. Can you survive long enough to leave the war behind?

FEATURES


  • Massive battles: team-based battles with up to hundreds of ships all dogfighting at the same time!
  • Hone your skill: no buffs for the player here - your only advantage over the AI pilots is your mastery of the starfighter.
  • Intelligent AI: be careful out there! The enemy will work in groups, try to pick off stragglers, and cover for each other.
  • Track your progress: as you move up the ranks, complete missions, and shoot down enemies, you'll receive a wide array of medals.
  • Duel enemy aces: as your victories stack up, your name might get noticed. Enemy aces will challenge you to one-on-one duels in deep space.

What are you waiting for, cadet? Get out there and help bring this fight to the enemy!

name: Starfighter Aces

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Single-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires minimum of 1920 x 1080 monitor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 GHz Single-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires minimum of 1920 x 1080 monitor

short_description: Massive battles rage in the stars! As a new pilot in the Allied Starfighter Corps, help turn the tide against a ruthless enemy. Hundreds of ships struggle to achieve victory in huge, team-based missions. Shoot down fighters, torpedo star cruisers, and duel famed enemy aces!
